item.title: Corpse Slayer
item.description: Does an extra 1d8 to undead and gives them disadvantage on saves to resist turning. Drow make, loses magic if exposed to sunlight for more than an hour in a 24 hour period.

item.title: Shield of Caution
item.description: While attuned to this shield you gain the following benefits: Warning: You are immune to the surprised condition.
